trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around September 15th 2006
Summary: Huge yellow light in the sky i saw out of my window
divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up in the middle of the night. It was i think at about 5 am and i was sick and out of school.i saw a huge light in the sky going up in a diagonal direction not really fast.i was scared and shocked. im not sure if it went out of sight or if i fell asleep again. the next night i saw it again. i think the second time could have been a dream.
